subject: Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Shackleford arrived at Belmont Park on Monday after an overnight van ride from Louisville, Ky., and a decision on whether he will run in the Belmont Stakes on June 11 may be made after he works out Wednesday.
snippet: Shackleford arrived at Belmont Park on Monday after an overnight van ride from Louisville, Ky., and a decision on whether he will run in the Belmont Stakes on June 11 may be made after he works out Wednesday.
